function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of proper physical distancing and safety measures at work sites","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health and safety risks of covid-19 in different work environments","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to safety measures in construction tasks","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher risk of exposure to unhealthy and symptomless persons suffering from covid-19","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and education on covid-19 safety measures","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 among construction workers","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases through direct contact or close proximity.","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Virus has different survival times on different surfaces, posing a risk of surface transmission","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive correlation between covid-19 infection and air pollution, leading to increased morbidity","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased spread of contagious diseases due to human-wildlife interaction","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in airborne disease transmission due to improved air quality","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Plasma therapy against covid-19","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission through close contact and body fluids","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission through contaminated objects","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Closure of emergency services during strict lockdown","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of specific
